name: T-Rex Park: Dinosaurs Survival
description:
Hunt or be hunted... This is the main sentence you must keep in your mind in this adventure.
Remember, this is how the era of Jurassic Dinosaurs works. The only thing you must focus on is... TO SURVIVE!!!
So, drive your jeep, look for the dinosaurs in you radar, take your weapon and shoot all real dinosaurs in the T-Rex Park!

This adventure started 65 millions ago... and now you should save the entire humanity, as the elite sniper you are.
You can choose different weapons and scenarios, and will enjoy with lots of different dinosaurs races.

DRIVE A JEEP
Get on the Jeep, drive fast and look for the dinosaurs in your radar detector to kill them!

HUNT DINOSAURS
You must hunt all dinosaurs to kill the race and save the humanity. Aim at your target, pull the trigger and pray! If you shoot them in the head you'll kill them in one-shot.

DIFFERENT LOCATIONS
Choose between different 3D realist scenarios, and practise your shooting in all conditions.

ELITE WEAPONS
You can shoot with lots of different elite weapons, to optimize the shooting depending on the distance, weather conditions and shot accuracy you need.
You'll find sniper guns, machine guns, rifles, shotguns and much more!

AMAZING REALISM WITH 3D GRAPHICS
Enjoy the extreme realism with realistic models and textures. We pretend to create the most amazing dino survival game for 2019.

Now you know what to do! Download this simulator for free and prove your survival skills!!!
